# Tender for Online Digital Engagement
=====================================

## Tender Details

*   Title: Online Digital Engagement
*   Reference Number: cb-837-41378722
*   Solicitation Number: 24062-24-283-001
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Publication Date: 2024-05-13
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-21 14:00:00

## General Information

*   The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat is soliciting proposals for the provision of a platform software as a service.
*   The contract duration is expected to be three years, from 2024-06-03 to 2026-05-31.
*   The procurement method is competitive and open to all qualified bidders.
*   Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Key Dates

*   Tender closing date: 2024-05-21 14:00:00
*   Expected contract start date: 2024-06-03
*   Initial contract duration: 3 years

## Language of Tender

*   The tender documents are available in English and French.

## Trade Agreements

*   This procurement is subject to several trade agreements, including:
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

*   The tender opportunity is open to all qualified bidders, and delivery is expected to be conducted in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Points of Contact

*   Dawn Dormer
*   Email: <dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca>
*   Phone: 343-542-8102

## Tender Documents

*   The tender documents are available on the Canada Store website. [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
